attributes.action: Make Adrian Goulder the Prime Minister and also Knight him and possibly lend him a copy of pootie-tang
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adrian Goulder is of the "Ledend Kind" we all know and appriaciate him. He has made miillions laugh...and cry but over all he is one damm sexy beast. so i ask you people of brittan to make this lovabel little scamp the Prime Minister

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
